text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) phwk than hen læw michı hrux ha kxallxh thrng thahı klangwan mi xyu tlxd pi kæ phwk than cn thung wan ki ya mah phracea xngkh dı lea xun ca kxallxh thi ca na klangkhun ma hı phwk than pheux phwk than ca di phakphxn nı wela nan phwk than mi phicarna tirtrxng du bang hrux
